```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RefManageR)
library(gt)

q <- '(Michael Luu) AND (Cedars-Sinai[Affiliation])'

data <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed(q, retmax = 999)

data <- data |> as_tibble()

```

```{r}
#| column: page

tbl <- data |>
  select(title, author, year, month, journal, doi) |>
  transmute(date = mdy(paste0(month, '-', year)),
            title, author, journal, doi) |> 
  arrange(desc(date))

tbl <- tbl |> 
  mutate(
    author = str_replace_all(author, ' and ', ', '),
    author = str_replace_all(author, 'Michael Luu', '**Michael Luu**'),
    doi = glue::glue('https://doi.org/{doi}'),
    title = glue::glue('<a href={doi}>{title}</a>')
  ) |> 
  select(-doi)

tbl |> 
  gt() |> 
  cols_label(
    date = 'Date',
    title = 'Title',
    author = 'Authors',
    journal = 'Journal'
  ) |> 
  opt_interactive(
    use_search = TRUE,
    use_filters = TRUE,
    use_resizers = TRUE,
    use_highlight = TRUE,
    use_compact_mode = TRUE,
    use_text_wrapping = TRUE,
    use_page_size_select = TRUE
  ) |> 
  fmt_markdown(columns = author) |> 
  fmt_date(columns = date,
           date_style = 'yMMM') |> 
  fmt_url(columns = title) |> 
  cols_align(columns = title, align = 'left') |> 
  tab_options(
    heading.title.font.size = 30,
    heading.title.font.weight = 'bold'
  )
```
